text: "Never Seen the Rain" is a song by Australian singer Tones and I, released in Australia on 16 July 2019 as the third single (second in the US) from Tones and I's debut EP The Kids Are Coming. Upon release Tones and I said "[It's] about people who live the same repetitive life in fear of failure. So, they never try." In January 2020, the single was released outside of Australia. In February, it achieved gold status in New Zealand. At the end of August 2020 it was certified 5× platinum by ARIA for shipment of 350000 copies. ==Critical reception== Al Newstead from ABC said "'Never Seen the Rain' retains her keen pop sensibilities but wraps those distinctive vocals into an uplifting chorus." ==Music video== The music video was produced by Visible Studios, directed by Nick Kozakis and Liam Kelly, and released on 7 August 2019. ==Personnel== Credits adapted from AllMusic. * Toni Watson – composer * Konstantin Kersting – mixing, production * Andrei Eremin – mastering ==Charts== ===Weekly charts=== {| class="wikitable sortable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center;" |- ! scope="col"| Chart (2019–2020) ! scope="col"| Peak position |- |- ! scope="row"|Australian Airplay (The Music Network) | 1 |- |- |- |- ! scope="row"| France (SNEP) | 46 |- |- ! scope="row"| Ireland (IRMA) | 21 |- ! scope="row"| Lithuania (AGATA) | 81 |- |- |- ! scope="row"| New Zealand (Recorded Music NZ) | 36 |- |- |- |- |- |- |} ===Year-end charts=== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center;" |- ! scope="col"| Chart (2019) ! scope="col"| Position |- ! scope="row"| Australia (ARIA) | 39 |} ==Certifications== ==Release history== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" |- !scope="col"|Region !scope="col"|Date !scope="col"|Format(s) !scope="col"|Label |- !scope="row"|Australia |16 July 2019 | |Bad Batch |} ==References== Category:2019 singles Category:2019 songs Category:Tones and I songs Category:Song recordings produced by Konstantin Kersting
title: Never Seen the Rain
